sentences.sContent: From long time ago, Chinese and Russia has become a kind of unique culture in tea history, tea habitude, tea sets and poems for tea.
sentences.sContent_eng: From long time ago, Chinese and Russia has become a kind of unique culture in tea history, tea habitude, tea sets and poems for tea.
sentences.sCn: 千百年来，中华民族和俄罗斯民族在饮茶的历史、饮茶习俗、茶具等方面，都形成了独具特色的茶文化。

sentences.sContent: While Modern emigrant reclaimed and Mongolian and Chinese lived together, the traditional living habitude of Mongolian has made many changes in Inner Mongolia.
sentences.sContent_eng: While Modern emigrant reclaimed and Mongolian and Chinese lived together, the traditional living habitude of Mongolian has made many changes in Inner Mongolia.
sentences.sCn: 近代以来的移民开垦和蒙汉杂居局面的形成，使得内蒙古地区蒙古人传统生活习俗发生了诸多变化。

words.tran: 习惯的；惯常的；习以为常的
习惯，熟习；[生理] 习惯化
